summary: Diff adds a new utility to map privilege names to Tailwind class overrides and wires it into FieldServiceGroupProfile, but the evidence does not show app-wide adoption. The utility also adds non-background styling changes (text color and hover styles), which conflicts with the constraint to change only background colors.

missing_requirements.requirement: Apply the Elder (#7C3AED) and Ministerial Servant (#2563EB) privilege badge background color changes across the app anywhere privilege badges are rendered (including publishers lists on Field Service Group profile pages).
missing_requirements.reason: The diff only shows usage/import in FieldServiceGroupProfile; no evidence of updating other pages/components where privilege badges may be rendered (e.g., publishers list page, publisher profile, other lists).

missing_requirements.requirement: Keep all other badge styling exactly the same (no changes besides background color: padding, border radius, font weight, size, etc.).
missing_requirements.reason: The new className overrides include `text-white` and `hover:bg[...]` which change non-background styling/behavior beyond just the background color.

hallucinated_features.description: Privilege badge overrides also force white text (`text-white`) and add hover background classes (`hover:bg[...]`).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asked to change the Elder/Ministerial Servant badge background colors and explicitly disallowed other styling changes.

hallucinated_features.description: Project metadata/state updates unrelated to badge color change (e.g., adding new_feature_requests entries marked pending).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest did not request changes to project tracking files/metadata.
